com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl

Class ComponentDeploymentDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.ComponentDeploymentDataManager

  • public class ComponentDeploymentDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ComponentDeploymentData items need to be populated with various facts as we merge everything together from the different sources. This class provides a set of methods which are useful for dealing with the ComponentDeploymentData items.

        list - of components, populated as we go with additional data from deployment descriptor

      • getDeploymentDataForComponent

        private ComponentDeploymentData getDeploymentDataForComponent(ComponentDeploymentData.ComponentId componentName,
                                                    java.util.Map<ComponentDeploymentData.ComponentId,ComponentDeploymentData> components,
                                                    boolean createIfNotExists)
        Looks up the component by name. If it does not find one it creates a new aggregate and sticks it in the map and then returns it.
        Parameters:
        unique - component Id
        list - of components
        create - if not found
        Returns:
        component data, or null if not found and not creating
